sentences.en: All are aposematuically colored , suggesting that they all are chemically protected.
sentences.cn: 它们全都有警戒色, 表明它们全都有化学的保护作用.

sentences.en: Biscuits and crackers are chemically leavened.
sentences.cn: 饼干和脆饼干是用化学方法发酵的。

sentences.en: But honestly there is no way for them to be sure. Until someone invents a way to chemically trace minerals from the source mine, it’s a very difficult problem.
sentences.cn: 但老实说，这个问题连他们自己也搞不清，除非有人能发明一种化学追踪法，可以将矿产一直追踪到开采地，这的确是个很麻烦的问题。

sentences.en: Carbon, hydrogen and oxygen combine chemically to form carbohydrates and fats.
sentences.cn: 碳、氢、氧化合形成碳水化合物和脂肪。

sentences.en: Contaminated instruments and floor surfaces should be chemically disinfected.
sentences.cn: 污染的器材和地面要用化学药物消毒.

sentences.en: Diamond is chemically allied to coal.
sentences.cn: 金刚石与煤在化学上是同类的.

sentences.en: Graphite is chemically allied to diamond.
sentences.cn: 石墨和金刚石在化学组成上有联系.

sentences.en: Hydrogen combines chemically with oxygen to form water.
Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily.
sentences.cn: 许多有尼古丁瘾的抽烟人不容易把烟戒掉.

sentences.en: Obviously the chain structure will affect the diffusion - controlled and chemically - controlled termination processes differently.
sentences.cn: 显然,链结构对扩散控制和化学控制的终止过程的影响是有差别的.

sentences.en: The medicine chemically affects your physiology.
sentences.cn: 这种药会通过化学作用影响生理机能。

sentences.en: The most chemically satisfying approach may seem to require the use of the assay system.
sentences.cn: 化学上最理想的探讨途径,似乎需要应用一些鉴定系统.

sentences.en: There have been attempts to modify the fiber chemically to resist abrasion enhancement.
sentences.cn: 过去曾设法用化学变性方法,提高纤维的抗磨损性能.

sentences.en: There may be a need for retarding growth chemically to keep trees within bounds.
sentences.cn: 可能需要用化学剂抑制生长,使树冠保持在一定的范围内.

sentences.en: These chemically active ferments cause havoc.
sentences.cn: 这些化学活性的酶造成广泛损害.

sentences.en: We inject guinea pigs or rabbits with enkephalins that are chemically coupled to large proteins.
sentences.cn: 我们将脑素和大分子蛋白质从化学上结合起来,把它注射给豚鼠或兔.

sentences.en: When exposed to stress, in whatever form, we react both chemically and physically.
sentences.cn: 当我们遇到压力, 而无论是何种压力时, 我们都会做出机能和体能上的反应.

words.tran_cn: 化学受体；[生理] 化学感受器（等于chemoceptor）
用化学方法吸收；用化学方法吸附

trans.tran_cn: 化学地，化学上地，用化学， 以化学方法
